definition: to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: We have had several tests so far this semester.
sentences.chinese: 这学期到现在为止我们已经考过好几次。

sentences.english: Yes. I’ve passed the TOEFL test.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我已经考过了托福。

sentences.english: I took the TOEFL and received a score of 620 points.
sentences.chinese: 我考过托福，我的分数是620。

sentences.english: I took it two months ago.
Cannot believe that I passed CET 6 without adequate preparations.
sentences.chinese: 其实很难相信自己没有怎么准备就考过了英语六级。

sentences.english: I also learn French and have passed the CFT4.
sentences.chinese: 我还学习了法语，并已考过了大学法语四级。

sentences.english: When he failed the driving test again he was really frustrated.
sentences.chinese: 当他考驾照又没考过的时候感到很灰心。

definition: to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to sit for a makeup exam/to resit an exam/makeup exam/resit
TOEFL/Test of English as a Foreign Language
(old) thanks to your lucky influence (polite reply to health inquiries)
to pass an exam or a test/to meet a minimum standard
to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program
TOEIC (Test of English for International Communication)
variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
